name: UniProt_get_entry_by_accession
description: Get the complete JSON entry for a specified UniProtKB accession. WARNING: This tool returns the complete UniProtKB entry, which can be extremely large (40,000+ lines for some entries) and may cause LLM context limits to be exceeded or crashes. For most use cases, consider using more specific extraction tools instead: UniProt_get_function_by_accession, UniProt_get_sequence_by_accession, UniProt_get_recommended_name_by_accession, UniProt_get_organism_by_accession, UniProt_get_subcellular_location_by_accession, UniProt_get_disease_variants_by_accession, or UniProt_get_ptm_processing_by_accession.

fields.output_description: Returns the complete UniProtKB entry JSON for that accession. WARNING: Output can be extremely large (40,000+ lines) and may exceed LLM context limits. Consider using specific extraction tools instead.

name: UniProt_get_function_by_accession
description: Extract functional annotations from UniProtKB entry (Comment type = FUNCTION).

fields.output_description: Returns a list of all functional paragraph texts from that entry.

name: UniProt_get_recommended_name_by_accession
description: Extract the recommended protein name (recommendedName) from UniProtKB entry.

fields.output_description: Returns the recommended protein full name string.

name: UniProt_get_alternative_names_by_accession
description: Extract all alternative names (alternativeNames) from UniProtKB entry.

fields.output_description: Returns a list containing all alternative name strings.

name: UniProt_get_organism_by_accession
description: Extract the organism scientific name from UniProtKB entry.

fields.output_description: Returns the organism scientific name string, e.g., "Homo sapiens".

name: UniProt_get_subcellular_location_by_accession
description: Extract subcellular localization annotations from UniProtKB entry (Comment type = SUBCELLULAR LOCATION).

fields.output_description: Returns a list containing all annotated subcellular localization locations.

name: UniProt_get_disease_variants_by_accession
description: Extract all variants (feature type = VARIANT) and their related annotations from UniProtKB entry.

fields.output_description: Returns a list of all variant feature objects, including position, original residue, variant residue, and disease annotations.

name: UniProt_get_ptm_processing_by_accession
description: Extract all PTM and processing sites from UniProtKB entry (feature type = MODIFIED RESIDUE or SIGNAL, etc.).

fields.output_description: Returns a list containing all modification sites and signal peptide feature objects.

name: UniProt_get_sequence_by_accession
description: Extract the canonical sequence from UniProtKB entry.

name: UniProt_get_isoform_ids_by_accession
description: Extract all splice isoform IDs from UniProtKB entry (isoformNames).

fields.output_description: Returns a list containing all isoform ID strings.

name: UniProt_search
description: Search UniProtKB database with flexible query syntax. Returns protein entries with accession numbers and metadata. Query syntax supports: field searches (gene:TP53, organism_id:9606, reviewed:true), ranges (length:[100 TO 500], mass:[20000 TO 50000]), wildcards (gene:MEIOB*), boolean operators (AND/OR/NOT), and parentheses for grouping. Examples: 'gene:TP53 AND organism_id:9606', 'length:[400 TO 500] AND reviewed:true', 'tissue:brain NOT organism_id:10090'.

query.description: Search query using UniProt syntax. Simple: 'MEIOB', 'insulin'. Field searches: 'gene:TP53', 'protein_name:insulin', 'organism_id:9606', 'reviewed:true'. Ranges: 'length:[100 TO 500]', 'mass:[20000 TO 50000]'. Wildcards: 'gene:MEIOB*'. Boolean: 'gene:TP53 AND organism_id:9606', 'tissue:brain OR tissue:liver', 'reviewed:true NOT fragment:true'. Use parentheses for grouping: '(organism_id:9606 OR organism_id:10090) AND gene:TP53'. Note: 'organism:' auto-converts to 'organism_id:'.

organism.description: Optional organism filter. Use common names ('human', 'mouse', 'rat', 'yeast') or taxonomy ID ('9606'). Automatically combined with query using AND. Will not duplicate if organism is already in query.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 25, max: 500). Accepts string or integer.

min_length.description: Minimum sequence length. Auto-converts to 'length:[min TO *]' range query.

max_length.description: Maximum sequence length. Auto-converts to 'length:[* TO max]' range query.

fields.description: List of field names to return (e.g., ['accession','gene_primary','length','organism_name']). When specified, returns raw API response with requested fields. Common fields: accession, id, gene_names, gene_primary, protein_name, organism_name, organism_id, length, mass, sequence, reviewed, cc_function. See UniProt API docs for full list. Default (no fields): returns formatted response with accession, id, protein_name, gene_names, organism, length.

name: UniProt_id_mapping
description: Map IDs between different databases (e.g., Ensembl to UniProt, Gene Name to UniProt). Supports batch mapping and async task processing. Use this to convert between different database identifiers.

ids.description: ID(s) to map. Can be single string or array of strings, e.g., 'ENSG00000141510' or ['MEIOB', 'TP53']

max_wait_time.description: Maximum time to wait for async task completion in seconds (default: 30)
